| HistoryText             = Little is known about the Zodiac. According to [[Thomas Shepherd (Earth-616)|Speed]], they consisted of a man with crab claws ([[Cancer (Taurus' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Cancer]]), another with a bull head ([[Taurus (Taurus' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Taurus]]), and a pair of attractive female twins ([[Gemini (Taurus' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Gemini]]). They were first encountered attacking the [[United Nations]] for unknown reasons{{r|Young Avengers #12}} before presumably being thwarted by the [[Young Avengers (Earth-616)|Young Avengers]].
